author: remm
msg: - Cross context should default to false.

author: craigmcc
msg: Fire the "removeChild" event before setting the child's "parent" property
to null.  This way, the event handler can still navigate up the component
hierarchy in order to perform related cleanup activities.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a (totally optional) compilation of a set of JMX ModelMBeans for the
key Catalina components, plus a listener that instantiates them at startup
time.  To enable this, you must uncomment the <Listener> element that is
immediately inside the <Server> element in server.xml.  If you set a port
number on this listener, you can access it via the "HtmlAdaptorServer"
interface of JMX (this is only useful for debugging the MBeans related
FIXME:  Doesn't yet deal with nested components related to containers.
Doesn't yet deregister MBeans when the corresponding component is
Submitted by:  Based on a bunch of work done by Amy Roh <Amy.Roh@sun.com>

author: amyroh
msg: Add the corresponding getters for instance variables for accessibility from Management Beans.
